items.text: full on middle, and worked behind to square leg. Quick single to get off the mark
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Latham, 1 run

items.text: full on off, and worked off his toes to square leg for a single
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Latham, 1 run

items.preText: Taylor just four away from his fifty
items.text: full just outside off, and he takes a big stride forward to block
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, no run

items.text: length ball on off, and angling into his pads. Worked away to square leg, but straight to the fielder there
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, no run

items.text: length ball on off, and he tries to work this to the leg side. Leading edge takes the ball back to Mashrafe
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, no run

items.text: length ball, just wide outside off, and he guides a late cut to third man for a single
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: full outside off stump, and Latham's happy to block this with soft hands. Ball rolls away to cover
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Latham, no run

items.text: full on middle, and he reaches forward to check-drive. Played to long on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: full just outside off, and he skips down the ground. Lifts it over the non-striker's head - and with only a mid-on - that's a very safe shot
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Latham, SIX runs

items.text: length ball on off, and guided to point
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Latham, no run

items.text: full on middle, and defended off the front foot
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Latham, no run

items.text: full just outside off, and he prods forward to drive through to deep extra cover
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Latham, 1 run

items.text: quicker ball, length on middle. Taylor rocks back and whips this behind square. Finds square-leg though
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, no run

items.text: length ball on off, and angling inwards. Punched off the back foot to mid on
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Latham, 1 run

items.preText: Tony: "NZ a hot chance for the World Cup?" -- What do you think? Should back themselves to make the semis for sure
items.text: full just outside off, and pushed away from his body to cover
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, no run

items.text: length ball on middle, and steered away to the vacant square-leg region. Moves on to 49
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: length ball on middle, and clipped off his pads to the leg side. Finds square leg
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Latham, no run

items.text: slower ball, full on leg stump. Tries to play the on-drive, but leading edge takes it to cover instead
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Latham, no run

items.text: slower ball again. Flicked off his pads to fine leg for a single from leg stump
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Latham, 1 run

items.text: length ball outside off, and turning further away. Pushed to extra cover for a single
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Latham, 1 run

items.text: length ball on off, and driven to long-on for a walking single. Fifty for Taylor
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: length ball, outside off, and cut off the back foot to deep point. They scamper back for the second run
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Latham, 2 runs

items.text: full on off, and check-driven to mid-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Latham, 1 run

items.text: slider on leg stump that goes down for a wide. Taylor happy to leave it alone
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, 1 wide

items.text: full on middle, and defended with soft hands to midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, no run
